extensionDescription.message: Helps OpenStreetMap contributors to easily switch between different maps and analysis tools from the community.

loading.message:
Loading...
If this does not stop loading, reload the page and try again.
loading.description: Shown in popup shortly before menu appears.

newOptionDetected_notice.message: Would you like to add this website in the menu?
newOptionDetected_notice.description: Shown in popup when an unknown website seems compatible with OpenStreetMap. Before the button

newOptionDetected_buttonText.description: Shown in popup when an unknown website seems compatible with OpenStreetMap. Inside the button

newOptionDetected_added.description: Shown in popup when an unknown website seems compatible with OpenStreetMap. After the button is clicked.

error_noAccess.message:
ERROR: Could not find or access current page.
If this is unexpected, please report it in $EXTENSION_SITE$.
error_noAccess.description: Error shown inside popup when the current page cannot be accessed (technical exception)

error_incompatibleWebsite.message:
ERROR: Current site was not recognized as compatible with OpenStreetMap.
If this is unexpected, you can report it in $EXTENSION_SITE$.
error_incompatibleWebsite.description: Error shown inside popup when appropriate

error_noInformationExtracted.message:
ERROR: The website was recognized, but it's parameters were not understood.
If you believe this is a bug, please report it in $EXTENSION_SITE$.
error_noInformationExtracted.description: Error shown inside popup when appropriate

site_howdidyoucontribute.message: How did you contribute to OSM?
